title: New: Jeremiah Jae – Lunch Special Pt. 4 [Mixtape]
body:
LA based label **Brainfeeder** has been pumping out some real gems recently, new releases from both **Samiyam** and **MARTYN** are just two of the label’s artists receiving justified attention for their new records.

Their latest release comes from oddball/surrealist MC, [**Jeremiah Jae**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Jeremiah-Jae/111580498919269). The new Mixtape, **_Lunch Special Pt. 4_**, gels together warm avant-garde beats with mind-bending word play and a dark sense of humour, to form something as baffling as it is groove filled. Throw in the fact that **Natural Cure, Flying Lotus, Raga** and **Projeck** all had a hand in producing the Mixtape, and you’re no doubt sold. Even if you’re not, it’s free, so you might as well be. Download the Mixtape [**here.**](http://www.mediafire.com/?1ekvzf8b11m277k)
